metadata.title: Chairperson BISP pays tribute to security forces for successful operation in Dera Ghazi Khan

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 02 (APP):Chairperson Benazir Income Support Programme (BISP), Rubina Khalid has lauded the security forces for their successful operation against militants in Dera Ghazi Khan, terming it a "remarkable display of strength and resolve." In a statement, Rubina Khalid praised the bravery and strategic execution of the operation in which four terrorists were neutralized. "This was a courageous manifestation of power and determination by our security forces," she said. She added that these terrorists were continuously plotting against the country and the nation, and their elimination is a significant step toward ensuring peace and stability. "Our security personnel's bravery and tactical approach are truly commendable. Such actions by our forces have saved countless lives," she remarked. Rubina Khalid emphasized that the operation was carried out with great caution and professionalism, reflecting the high standards of discipline and commitment within the forces. "Our brave military, police, and security forces remain ever-ready to defend the country and its people," she concluded.
